thread.title: Emotech shows off Olly, the most likable personal assistant around
thread.title_full: Emotech shows off Olly, the most likable personal assistant around

author: Pollyanna
title: Emotech shows off Olly, the most likable personal assistant around
text:
By Haje Jan Kamps 
Over the years, we’ve seen a lot of devices you can talk to to make them do stuff. That’s all good and well, but apart from talking back to you, they don’t really seem to care about you all that much. Emotech takes a different tack with Olly, adding personality and giving the assistant a physical personality. And it’s pretty damn cute, too.   techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
